channel.title: Wtf is wrong with this snippet?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with this snippet?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

alright , im using Exions PI base ( 317 )
i want to make it so that soulsplit ( prayer 24 )
will heal you 1/4 of the dmg you make.

this is what i got:

				if(o.prayerActive[24]){
						int heal = (int)(damage / 4);
						if(c.playerLevel[3] + heal > c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) {
							c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
						} else {
							c.playerLevel[3] += heal;
						}
						c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
				}

its basically the same as the blood spells , still can’t get it to work…
there are no errors at compiling , it just doesnt work…

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with this snippet?
